name: GitHub Actions: Go Test
description: Run Go tests with module caching.

files.template:
name: Go

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-go@v5
        with:
          go-version: '1.22'
          cache: true
      - run: go test ./...
